messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: REPORT: 890-4759-D DATE: 9/05/23  On sEpTember 3, Officer B. C. Dawson was called to 2381 Maple Boulevard after receiving reports of a potential break-in. Residents Mr. Graham, a teacher, and Ms. Ward, a nurse, were the primary witnesses. FORWARD TO: PatrOL Division. COMMUNITY FEEDBACK. Deputy R. S. Thompson - DISPATCH.  Upon Dawson's arrival at around 2:10 PM, a neighbor, Mrs. Green, approached with additional observations. Patrol Officer D. E. Farrell was then called to assist due to the gathering crowd. CASE HANDLED BY: Deputy THOMPSON, DISPATCH.  Graham pointed to a shattered window and noted that he had seen a shadowy figure in his backyard. Ward mentioned hearing suspicious noises around midnight. Following their leads, Detective F. G. Hartman was brought in to investigate further.  Evidence collected by Criminalist Laura and Criminalist Steve indicated an attempted burglary. SENT TO: FORENSIC TEAM. EVIDENCE 4098. Items included a torn glove, broken glass, and a makeshift lock pick. Captain I. J. Keller was briefed on the findings.  Detective Hartman, with the aid of Lieutenant K. L. Morse, managed to identify two suspects based on the evidence. Sergeant M. N. Olsen then led a team to execute a search warrant. By 6:45 PM, both suspects were taken into custody.  SEND TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 2 - STATUS [CHECK TWO] Officer Dawson, Patrol Officer Farrell, Detective Hartman, Criminalist Laura, Criminalist Steve, Captain Keller, Lieutenant Morse, Sergeant Olsen, Deputy Thompson  INVESTIGATION DOCUMENTS:  Photographs Forensic Analysis Witness Testimonies Audio Recordings Incident Summary (6) Suspect Profiles CONTACT HEAD: COMMANDER L. P. Turner L.C.P.D. 890-012 R6A 9801 Graham, MARK ADDRESS: TELEPHONE: 452-9076 OFFICER: B. C. DAWSON ITEM: 112-9450- 215 CRIME: 2:10 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 67891 - ACKNOWLEDGED Jane White DATE 9/06/23 SEND TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION FINAL.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Officer B. C. Dawson  
Officer Context: On September 3, Officer B. C. Dawson was called to 2381 Maple Boulevard after receiving reports of a potential break-in.  
Officer Role: Officer 

Officer Name: Deputy R. S. Thompson  
Officer Context: FORWARD TO: Patrol Division. COMMUNITY FEEDBACK. Deputy R. S. Thompson - DISPATCH.  
Officer Role: Deputy 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer D. E. Farrell  
Officer Context: Patrol Officer D. E. Farrell was then called to assist due to the gathering crowd.  
Officer Role: Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Detective F. G. Hartman  
Officer Context: Following their leads, Detective F. G. Hartman was brought in to investigate further.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Criminalist Laura  
Officer Context: Evidence collected by Criminalist Laura and Criminalist Steve indicated an attempted burglary.  
Officer Role: Criminalist 

Officer Name: Criminalist Steve  
Officer Context: Evidence collected by Criminalist Laura and Criminalist Steve indicated an attempted burglary.  
Officer Role: Criminalist 

Officer Name: Captain I. J. Keller  
Officer Context: Captain I. J. Keller was briefed on the findings.  
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Lieutenant K. L. Morse  
Officer Context: Detective Hartman, with the aid of Lieutenant K. L. Morse, managed to identify two suspects based on the evidence.  
Officer Role: Lieutenant 

Officer Name: Sergeant M. N. Olsen  
Officer Context: Sergeant M. N. Olsen then led a team to execute a search warrant.  
Officer Role: Sergeant
